scripts.dev: node scripts/copy-branding.mjs && node scripts/generate-icons.mjs && node scripts/generate-favicon.mjs && node scripts/dev-detect-api.mjs && vite --host
scripts.prebuild: node scripts/copy-branding.mjs && node scripts/generate-icons.mjs && node scripts/generate-favicon.mjs
scripts.smoke:start:stack: concurrently -k -s first -n api,web -c blue,green "cross-env PORT=4010 node server/server.js" "npx serve -s dist -l tcp://0.0.0.0:5174"
scripts.smoke:run: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/smoke.cy.js
scripts.smoke:all: npm run smoke:build && start-server-and-test "npm run smoke:start:stack" http://localhost:4010/health "npm run smoke:run"
scripts.mobile:run: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-home.cy.js
scripts.mobile:itinerary: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-itinerary.cy.js
scripts.mobile:packages: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-packages.cy.js
scripts.mobile:bookings: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-bookings.cy.js
scripts.mobile:quotes: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-quotes.cy.js
scripts.mobile:contact: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-contact.cy.js
scripts.mobile:about: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-about.cy.js
scripts.mobile:partners: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-partners.cy.js
scripts.mobile:compliance: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-compliance.cy.js
scripts.mobile:promotions: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-promotions.cy.js
scripts.mobile:support: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-support.cy.js
scripts.mobile:safety: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-safety.cy.js
scripts.mobile:terms: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-terms.cy.js
scripts.mobile:reports: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-reports.cy.js
scripts.mobile:plantrip: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-plantrip.cy.js
scripts.mobile:trips: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-trips.cy.js
scripts.mobile:profile: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-profile.cy.js
scripts.mobile:settings: cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:4010 cypress run --browser chrome --e2e --spec cypress/e2e/mobile-settings.cy.js
scripts.mobile:all: npm run smoke:build && start-server-and-test "npm run smoke:start:stack" http://localhost:4010/health "npm run mobile:run && npm run mobile:itinerary && npm run mobile:packages && npm run mobile:bookings && npm run mobile:quotes && npm run mobile:contact && npm run mobile:about && npm run mobile:partners && npm run mobile:compliance && npm run mobile:promotions && npm run mobile:support && npm run mobile:safety && npm run mobile:terms && npm run mobile:reports && npm run mobile:plantrip && npm run mobile:trips && npm run mobile:profile && npm run mobile:settings"
